original_text:
King of Macedonia
La figura di Alessandro Magno è di quelle che si impara a conoscere già sui banchi di scuola: allievo di Aristotele, comandante militare di enorme talento e forse il sovrano più famoso della storia, con un impero costruito a soli trent’anni che si estendeva dalla Grecia fino alle terre dell’India.
Versione online di una slot terrestre già presente nel 2016, King of Macedonia è una delle ultime uscite nel catalogo di casa IGT.
Il compartimento grafico di questa slot si addice appieno alla magnificenza del personaggio che ne è protagonista: le immagini sono molto vivide e realistiche, con l’imponente figura di Alessandro magno che si staglia sia sulla schermata iniziale che sulla griglia di gioco. Lo sfondo è un tripudio di colore, con le tonalità dell’oro messe in risalto su templi e gioielli, in contrasto con un cielo magico.
I giocatori non potranno non ritenersi soddisfatti da una grafica del genere, molto bella e che ancora una volta conferma la software house IGT come uno dei leader nel mercato delle slot machine.
Simboli, gameplay e funzionalità
La slot machine King of Macedonia presenta una struttura classica a cinque rulli e 40 linee di pagamento, con cinque righe al posto delle canoniche tre.
Per vincere si devono abbinare simboli identici su rulli adiacenti a partire da sinistra verso destra.
I simboli sono interamente tematici (non ci sono i cosiddetto “reali”) e sono rappresentati da pergamene, una cetra, delle anfore,  alcune ciotole, dei portagioie e gli immancabili elmi col pennacchio rosso; i simboli che hanno valore maggiore sono invece una bellissima donna e dei cavalli neri in corsa.
Il Wild di King of Macedonia non poteva non essere il re Alessandro Magno in persona: ha la funzione di jolly e come tale può prendere il posto di qualsiasi altro simbolo quando si deve completare una combinazione vincente.
Oltre al Wild è presente un simbolo Bonus che può comparire solo sul primo rullo e regala un moltiplicatore pari a 10 volte il valore della puntata; le cose si fanno interessanti quando compaiono contemporaneamente i simboli Wild e Bonus, perché in questo caso si otterranno ben otto giri gratuiti.
Slot simili a King of Macedonia
Nel mondo delle slot machine non mancano di certo i giochi dedicati alle culture del passato e ai miti, le leggende e i personaggi che ne hanno fatto la storia.
Sull’Antico Egitto, per esempio, non si contano più le slot a tema, a partire dalla fortunata serie di Book of Ra fino alle slot più recenti come Eye of Horus Megaways della Blueprint Gaming.
Anche le slot dedicate all’Antica Grecia sono numerose, soprattutto quelle che hanno come protagonista Zeus e le altre divinità dell’Olimpo. Tra queste ricordiamo Kronos Unleashed, The Legend of Olympus o Greek Gods di casa Pragmatic Play.

raw_translation.response:
King of Macedonia
The figure of Alexander the Great is one that is learned about already in school: a student of Aristotle, a military commander of immense talent and perhaps the most famous ruler in history, with an empire built at only thirty years old that extended from Greece to the lands of India.

An online version of a land-based slot already present in 2016, King of Macedonia is one of the latest releases in the IGT catalog. The graphics compartment of this slot fully matches the magnificence of the protagonist: the images are very vivid and realistic, with the imposing figure of Alexander the Great standing out both on the initial screen and on the game board. The background is a riot of color, with gold tones highlighted on temples and jewels, in contrast with a magical sky.

Players cannot fail to be satisfied with such beautiful graphics, which once again confirms the software house IGT as one of the leaders in the slot machine market.

Symbols, gameplay, and functionalities
The King of Macedonia slot machine features a classic structure with five reels and 40 paylines, with five rows instead of the usual three. To win, identical symbols must be matched on adjacent reels from left to right.

The symbols are entirely thematic (there are no so-called "royals") and are represented by scrolls, a lyre, amphorae, some bowls, jewelry boxes, and the inevitable helmets with the red plume; the symbols of greater value are instead a beautiful woman and black horses running.

The Wild of King of Macedonia could not be other than King Alexander the Great himself: it has the function of a wild card and as such can take the place of any other symbol when a winning combination must be completed. 

In addition to the Wild, there is a Bonus symbol that can only appear on the first reel and gives a multiplier equal to 10 times the value of the bet; things get interesting when Wild and Bonus symbols appear simultaneously, as this will result in eight free spins.

Slots similar to King of Macedonia
In the world of slot machines, games dedicated to past cultures and myths, legends and characters that have made history are certainly not lacking. For example, there are numerous slot machines devoted to Ancient Egypt, from the successful Book of Ra series to more recent slots such as Eye of Horus Megaways by Blueprint Gaming. There are also many slots dedicated to Ancient Greece, especially those featuring Zeus and the other gods of Olympus. These include Kronos Unleashed, The Legend of Olympus, or Greek Gods by Pragmatic Play.

Below is a review for the slot game "King of Macedonia".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay Features
Graphics and Design

Target Audience

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ

- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: King of Macedonia
The figure of Alexander the Great is one we learn to know already in school: a student of Aristotle, military commander of great talent and perhaps the most famous ruler in history, with an empire built at only thirty years old, which extended from Greece to the lands of India.
An online version of a land-based slot already present in 2016, King of Macedonia is one of the latest releases in the IGT catalog.
The graphics department of this slot fully suits the magnificence of the character who is the protagonist: the images are very vivid and realistic, with the imposing figure of Alexander the Great standing out both on the initial screen and on the game board. The background is a riot of color, with gold shades highlighted on temples and jewels, in contrast to a magical sky.
Players cannot fail to be satisfied with such beautiful graphics, which once again confirm the IGT software house as one of the leaders in the slot machine market.
Symbols, gameplay, and features
The King of Macedonia slot machine has a classic structure with five reels and 40 paylines, with five rows instead of the usual three.
To win, identical symbols must be matched on adjacent reels starting from the left to the right.
The symbols are entirely thematic (there are no so-called "royals") and are represented by scrolls, a lyre, amphorae, some bowls, jewel boxes, and the inevitable helmets with red plumes; the symbols that have the highest value are instead a beautiful woman and black horses in a race.
The Wild of King of Macedonia could not be anyone other than King Alexander himself: it has the function of a wild card and as such can take the place of any other symbol when a winning combination needs to be completed.
In addition to the Wild, there is a Bonus symbol that can only appear on the first reel and gives a multiplier equal to 10 times the value of the bet; things get interesting when the Wild and Bonus symbols appear simultaneously, because in this case, eight free spins will be obtained.
Slots similar to King of Macedonia
In the world of slot machines, there is no shortage of games dedicated to past cultures and myths, legends, and characters who have made history.
For example, there are countless slots dedicated to Ancient Egypt, starting from the successful Book of Ra series up to the most recent slots such as Eye of Horus Megaways by Blueprint Gaming.
Even slots dedicated to Ancient Greece are numerous, especially those featuring Zeus and other Olympian gods. Among these, we can remember Kronos Unleashed, The Legend of Olympus, or Greek Gods by Pragmatic Play.

response.headline: Get Ready for the Battle with ‘King of Macedonia'
response.content:
Are you ready to step into the shoes of an ancient hero? King of Macedonia offers players a 5-reel, 40 payline slot game with a twist. With five rows instead of the usual three, you have more chances of winning big, and who doesn't love winning big?!

The symbols in this game are totally unique and fascinating. From scrolls and amphorae to helmets with red plumes and black horses in a race, you'll feel like you're a part of the universe Alexander himself built! And guess what? No boring royals in this game!

If you're feeling lucky and want to earn even more, Wild King Alexander is here to help you. This charismatic character can take the place of any other symbol when a winning combination needs to be completed. And if you land Bonus symbol, be ready to multiply your bet by 10! Don't worry, it's not that difficult to get bonus symbol; it can only appear on the first reel; still, you better keep your fingers crossed.

You know what's even better than winning big? You guessed it right - Winning big while not even spending a penny! Yes, you heard it right. When the Wild and Bonus symbols appear simultaneously, eight free spins will be up for grabs. So don't sit back. Get up and start your battle with ‘King of Macedonia' today!

King of Macedonia also features a Bonus symbol that can only appear on the first reel and gives a multiplier equal to 10 times the value of the bet. King of Macedonia has stunning and realistic graphics that take players to the world of Alexander the Great. The images are vivid, and the character of Alexander the Great stands out both on the initial screen and the game board. The background is a riot of color with gold shades highlighting temples and jewels, in contrast to a magical sky. The theme of King of Macedonia is centered on Alexander the Great, one of the most famous rulers in history. Alexander the Great was a student of Aristotle, a military commander of great talent, and an empire ruler built at only thirty years old that extended from Greece to the lands of India. The slot machine is an online version of a land-based game already present in 2016.

Bonuses and Free Spins

In addition to the Wild, King of Macedonia features a Bonus symbol that can only appear on the first reel and gives a multiplier of ten times the value of the bet. When the Wild and Bonus symbols appear simultaneously, eight free spins are awarded to players. Players will find the slot fascinating, entertaining, and rewarding because of the bonuses and free spins that the game offers.

Target Audience

King of Macedonia, with its stunning graphics, excellent gameplay features, and bonuses, is an excellent slot game for both new and experienced players. Fans of past cultures, myths, legends, and characters in history will find this online slot game captivating. The game is suitable for players who enjoy a classic structure with a twist, and those who are attracted by the prospect of a big win through the multiplier and free spins.
